item.description: If you learned the geography of the palm in class II, you will have learned the geography of the palm in class, now you will enter the palm and feel how it is to live that life, focusing on relationships, intellectual interests, career, health and life changes. Feel the energy that powers each activity â€“ drive, impact on the world, discovering oneself, creativity and communication, and that of love, imagination, emotion, and more. Learn the direction of Time and use it, feel the disruption of a break, the hope of a branch, learn how to bridge gaps, embed messages to save a life and maybe feel a genius spot if a student has one.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be standing with the guest speaker, Paul Rice.
item.name: EMPATHETIC PALM READING
